QuestData.Title: The Moth Rebellion
QuestData.Description: Oh... oh good! A $c! Could you help me?$b$bI created a strain of vile monsters during my experiments to improve silk output.$b$bThe result was a full-scale moth rebellion. Can you use your $ciness and destroy some of these mutants?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Mutated Silkmoths and 8 Tiny Mutated Silkmoths.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems like there's not QUITE as many corrupted moths out there. At the very least, you've bought me some more time before I get in big, big trouble.
